mapper.update:
update activity
app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
free = #{free,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER},

end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ext2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rule = #{rule,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update activity set app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, free = #{free,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ext1 = #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext2 = #{ext2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rule = #{rule,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
